name: A test for setting a value in a field
description: The test sets the value in the field, and then checks the value in the field with what should be set
descriptionHtml: The test sets the value in the field, and then checks the value in the field with what should be set

steps.name: Launching the browser...
Authorization via KeyCloak with login: demo and password
Entering a username: demo
Entering a password
Clicking on the Login button

testStage.description: The test sets the value in the field, and then checks the value in the field with what should be set

steps.name: Selecting the Number basic section in the left menu.
Selecting a tab Form on a page
Validation FormWidget by heading (Title) Form title
Validation of a field with the NumberDigits by heading custom Field
Setting the 131343.23 value in the field
Checking the fractional part of the number and the number of digits entered after the dot in the field
Getting the number of digits after the decimal point
Getting the number of digits after the decimal point
Getting the number of digits after the decimal point
Getting the number of digits after the decimal point
Getting the number of digits after the decimal point
Getting a value from a field
Getting the number of digits after the decimal point
Print browser logs and response...
Closing the browser window

labels.name: suite
labels.value: Form. Checking the basic functions for the NumberDigits in the widget Form
